Hi,

I have Cantera installed on a linux machine and am using it in place
o=
f Chemkin to calculate properties of gases for an ignition code I'm
develop=
ing.  I'm seeing a problem that I think goes back to Cantera. 
The problem =
I'm having is with the call getEnthalpy_RT(MassFracs).  It
looks like when =
the temperature is set with setTemperature(Temp) and
that temperature is ou=
tside the range of applicability (as dictated by
the input mechanism file) =
-- low, in my case -- the fit is used at the
given temperature, instead of =
at the limit, which is what I expected.

I was curious what should be retur=
ning from Cantera when
getEnthalpy_RT(MassFracs) is made and setTemperature=
(Temp) has been
set outside the defined range of applicability for a given =
fit.  Thanks.

Dan Smyth
BYU
